imgDesc.text:
The Nirodha Fruits are borne by special plants that have been nourished by the Amrita, and their juices contain that same mysterious power.
<color=#ffe14b>Press Sorush's Interact skill</color> to cause her to harvest Nirodha Fruits and <color=#ffe14b>gain the ability to throw them</color> , using their power to stand against the impurities.
As they contain Amrita, the Nirodha Fruits' juices can also melt through special crystals created from solidified Amrita...
